smw-maintenance-requires-enabled-semanti.en: You need to have Semantic MediaWiki enabled in order to run the maintenance script!

smw-maintenance-populatehashfield-descri.en: Populate the 'smw_hash' field for all entities that have a missing entry.

smw-maintenance-runlocalmessagecopy-abou.en: The script allows to copy messages from a local `$1` file to/from the i18n translation system.

smw-maintenance-runlocalmessagecopy-usag.en: This script is not expected to be used by any user or administrator and is only provided for convenience to the Semantic MediaWiki project.
